body:
Hello Everyone!
                               My name is Matthew and I am pleased to finally be able to create an Avicus account, Iv'e wanted to be part of the community for several months since my friend (username=chip_56) told me about an amazing server. I currently play on skywars and my favourite map is JUSTICE.
MTINC

title: MTINC

replies.body:
Hey there ! :)
Welcome to the Avicus Community! :D If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask any Staff Member, as we will help you! ^~^ See ya around! ;D
replies.body_tagged:
Hey there ! :)
Welcome to the Avicus Community! :D If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask any Staff Member, as we will help you! ^~^ See ya around! ;D

replies.body:
Welcome to the Avicus Network forums, Nice to meet you.
And yes the map "Justice" is great, I love it too.
But I just want to say look at the forums rules, I say this because sometimes they forget about that. If you need help by making a map or so, feel free to ask a MapDev or contact me on skype :D (flo.schmenni). You also can add me if you have any questions :D Have Fun!
